I am an [Associate Professor in Genetics & Data Science](https://research-portal.uea.ac.uk/en/persons/philip-leftwich) in the School of Biological Sciences at the University of East Anglia. Please see below for my teaching and research interests.

## {{< fa chalkboard-teacher title="A teacher at a chalkboard" >}} Teaching

I teach on a number of undergraduate modules in Biological Sciences, with a particular focus on Genetics, Genomics and Data Science.
